text: Zebb Wayne Quinn (May 12, 1981 - missing since January 2, 2000) was an American missing person. On July 10, 2017, it was announced that Zebb was murdered. His killer was charged. == Disappearance == On January 2, 2000, sometime at 9:00 PM, after he was done working his shift at Walmart, he arrived at a store and brought soda. Later, he went with a friend to go look for a vehicle that was on sale. His friend, Owens made a phone call to Walmart saying he was Zebb and that he was sick. Almost 2 weeks after he went missing, the vehicle was found with an alive puppy inside it, along with a keycard for a hotel, and lipstick. == References == Category:1981 births Category:2000 crimes Category:2000 in the United States Q Category:People from Asheville, North Carolina Category:20th century in North Carolina Category:January events Category:2000 events
title: Disappearance of Zebb Quinn
